category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_no_action_highlight_color
preference.preference_description: Specifies the highlight color used by Simulation Process Management operations to indicate that no action is needed on an object. The valid value is a triplet of integer values from 0 to 255 separated by the ";" character. The default value is "0;255;0".
